name: LovePanda
description: There are 50 wild pandas in Chengdu needing money for their protection.

name: HeartBeat
description: Save 27 children with heart problems at Ohio Hospital.

name: Save Stray Pets
description: Save hundreds of stray pets in Baltimore and find them a home.

name: VAD
description: Vitamin A deficiency (VAD) is the leading cause of preventable blindness in children and increases the risk of disease and death from severe infections.
